name: OR_LOG_FRACTURE_SCAPULA
description: This table contains information about the status of scapula fractures for the given surgery.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FRACTURE_SCAPULA_C_NAME
columns.description: The scapula fracture status category ID for the surgical log.
